subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Originally {{zh-l|*𣦃}} or {{zh-l|*前}}, a {{Han compound|歬|c1=p|刀|t2=knife|c2=s|ls=psc|nocap=y}}. Since {{zh-l|*前}} has replaced {{zh-l|*歬}}, an additional {{zh-l|*刀}} has been added.
